title: Plane crash in China
description: A China Eastern Airlines passenger jet with 132 people on board crashed in the mountains of southern China en route from the southwestern city of Kunming to Guangzhou, on the east coast.

title: Built to win
description: The adaptive sports tools powering the 2022 Winter Paralympics

title: The race to reconnect Tonga
description: How engineers will repair the undersea communications cable severed by the recent volcanic eruption

title: China steps up construction along disputed Bhutan border
Witnesses to slaughter
description: Reuters has maps the violence in western Tigray by drawing on more than 120 interviews in Ethiopia and Sudan.

title: Military missteps in the Amazon
description: Wrangled QGIS to build a map showing the extent of deforestation and forest fires in Brazil’s Amazon rainforest.

title: Myanmar’s new wave of detainees
description: Worked with the Myanmar bureau to visualize the number of people detained following the military coup. Also tracked the reported gender, age and cause of death of the people killed by security forces.

title: The conflict in Ethiopia
description: Compiled reporting and photos from Reuters’ East Africa bureau and collaborated with a correspondent to recreate and provide context on how the Ethiopia conflict in the northern state of Tigray unfolded over the course of a month.
skills: HTML/CSS/JS, QGIS, ai2html/Illustrator, Datawrapper, Excel, Photoshop, Premiere Pro

title: The Nagorno-Karabakh conflict
description: Created a scrolly explainer with annotated maps and photos to walk readers through the Nagorno Karabakh conflict and its impact on both local populations and international oil supplies.
skills: HTML/CSS/JS, QGIS, ai2html/Illustrator, Datawrapper, Excel, Photoshop

title: The mobilising power of the BTS ARMY
description: Interviewed BTS fans and experts, created the data graphics and designed and built the page. It won an Award of Excellence at the SND: Best of Digital News Design awards, and BTS fans showed their love on Twitter.

title: Reopening a megacity
description: Designed and built a scrolly reconstruction of how Wuhan gradually reopened its doors to the public. Illustrated an isometric city, recreated a Chinese health status checker and visualized China's coronavirus cases and testing.

title: India's citizenship protests
description: Visualized the anti-CAA and pro-CAA demonstrations that took place nearly every day for several months, and calculated the death toll and use of violence.
